constantValues: An opportunity represents a qualified prospect or an existing customer's interest in a product of the bank.

definitions.description: An opportunity represents a qualified prospect or an existing customer's interest in a product of the bank.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: costOfProperty

constantValues: The price of the property for which customer is applying for the loan.

members.description: The price of the property for which customer is applying for the loan.

members.name: costOfPropertyBase

constantValues: Value of the Cost of Property in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Cost of Property in base currency.

members.name: downPayment

constantValues: The total down payment that customer has made against the car or property for which he is applying for the loan.

members.description: The total down payment that customer has made against the car or property for which he is applying for the loan.

members.name: downPaymentBase

constantValues: Value of the Down Payment in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Down Payment in base currency.

members.name: interestRate

constantValues: The rate of interest applicable to the product. The applicable rate must be fetched from the product catalog based on the requested amount.

members.description: The rate of interest applicable to the product. The applicable rate must be fetched from the product catalog based on the requested amount.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: preferredFollowUpTime

constantValues: Convenient time for the customer to be contacted.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'preferredFollowUpTime_display' is added to the 'Opportunity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'preferredFollowUpTime'
addSupportingAttribute.name: preferredFollowUpTime_display

members.description: Convenient time for the customer to be contacted.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: productId

constantValues: The product that the customer is applying for.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The product that the customer is applying for.

members.name: purposeOfLoan

constantValues: The reason or purpose for which customer is applying for the loan.

members.description: The reason or purpose for which customer is applying for the loan.

members.name: requestedAmount

constantValues: The amount of the product that customer is applying for such as the loan amount or card limit.

members.description: The amount of the product that customer is applying for such as the loan amount or card limit.

members.name: requestedAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Requested Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Requested Amount in base currency.

members.name: termOfLoan

constantValues: The number of months that customer is requesting as term of the loan.

members.description: The number of months that customer is requesting as term of the loan.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the opportunity is open, won, or lost. Won and lost opportunities are read-only and can't be edited until they are reactivated.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Opportunity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows whether the opportunity is open, won, or lost. Won and lost opportunities are read-only and can't be edited until they are reactivated.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Opportunity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display
